DialogUpdateScore.update_score: Update the score for the game

ViewPlayerRegistration.headline: Player Registration
ViewPlayerRegistration.after: Thank you for registration! Please confirm your e-mail with the verification link, we sent you to your email.
ViewPlayerRegistration.verification_failed: This verification link doesn't seem to be correct.

email.correct: Please input a valid mail address

ViewPlayerRegistration.registration_failed_detail: Please check your input and if you are already registered.
ViewPlayerRegistration.not_found: Can't find yourself? Maybe you forgot to register yourself.

TournamentSettings.missing_date: Please select a period of time
TournamentSettings.wrong_dates: Begin of game phase needs to be after end of registration phase

ViewSignUp.atLeastOneLetter: Please type at least one letter

ViewCompetition.registration_not_started: Registration hasn't started yet. Registration phase starts on
ViewCompetition.no_registration: It seems that no one has registered yet...
ViewCompetition.warning_register_before_signup: Players need to be registered before signup

invalid_step.detail: Previous steps need to be fulfilled first

assignMatches.emptyGroupDet: Every group needs at least 2 teams
assignMatches.knockout_not_assigned: Not all players have been assigned yet

ViewPrepare.prepared_not_published: The competition has been prepared, but not published so far. You can reset the progress to restart the preparation.
ViewPrepare.prepare_reset_warning: All drawn and scheduled matches will be reset. Only assigned teams will be kept. Do you really want to reset the preparation?
ViewPrepare.prepared_published: The competition has been prepared and published. You can no longer revoke preparation.

scheduleMatches.error_cont_not_scheduled: All matches need to be scheduled before continuing

ViewPrepare.publish_warning:
Publishing notifies all players via E-Mail.
Afterwards, you are more limited in editing the competition.
ViewPrepare.publish_consider_all:
Consider using the function "Publish all".
This gives the players a combined E-Mail, leading to less spam.
ViewPrepare.published_single: Competition has been published. All players were notified.
ViewPrepare.published_single_missing: Competition has been published. Not all players could be notified, as they did not specify an email address.
ViewPrepare.published_all: All competitions have been published. All players were notified.
ViewPrepare.published_all_missing: All competitions have been published. Not all players could be notified, as they did not specify an email address.

ViewExecution.published_single: Match has been moved. All players were notified.
ViewExecution.published_single_missing: Match has been moved. Not all players could be notified, as they did not specify an email address.
ViewExecution.published_all: Matches have been moved. All players were notified.
ViewExecution.published_all_missing: Matches have been moved. Not all players could be notified, as they did not specify an email address.
ViewExecution.not_yet_published: You need to publish the competition before entering results

validation.field_invalid_email: Field is not a valid email address
validation.field_invalid_date: Field is not a valid date
validation.field_invalid_number: Field is not a valid number
validation.field_invalid_url: Field is not a valid URL
validation.date_missing: Please choose start and end date

court.not_selected: All fields need to be filled

settings.admin_needed_summary: Players need to be verified before being able to sign up to a competition
